p: Optimal Extraction of Ocimum basilicum Essential Oil by Association of Ultrasound and Hydrodistillation and Its Potential as a Biopesticide Against a Major Stored Grains Pest by Eridiane da Silva Moura, Lêda Rita D’Antonino Faroni, Fernanda Fernandes Heleno, Alessandra Aparecida Zinato Rodrigues, Lucas Henrique Figueiredo Prates and Maria Eliana Lopes Ribeiro de Queiroz Molecules 2020, 25(12), 2781; https://doi.org/10.3390/molecules25122781
